author: marvin
msg: Change over trunk/perl/xs to C99-style line comments.

author: ate
msg: JS2-1136: Cleanup and strengthening the Security Entity/LDAP mapping
- fixing some obvious bugs causing potential NPEs during sychronization
NB: validation and verification of the LDAP sychronizer not yet completed

author: ate
msg: JS2-1143: New LDAP UserPasswordCredentialManager providing LDAP authentication, maintenance of LDAP credentials and UserPasswordCredentialPolicyManager support
- fix creation of new PasswordCredential for first time users synchronized from LDAP

author: ate
msg: I noticed UserManagerImpl always tries to retrieve the PasswordCredential for the anonymous (guest) user which of course is not needed.

Furthermore, the JetspeedSecuritySerializer always created a PasswordCredential on import even if one wasn't defined (ending up being "empty", e.g. no password set, including the useless one for the "guest" user)

author: mor
msg: In the service def. replaced <check-permission> with <permission-service> tag such that a permission checking is done using a permission
service. Also moved the permission checking logic to service definition.
